## Welcome to tinyimg

The **tinyimg** package optimizes and compresses images using Rust libraries. 
Currently supports PNG optimization via the [oxipng](https://github.com/shssoichiro/oxipng) crate.

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("yihui/tinyimg")
```

## Usage

The main function is `optim_png()`:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(tinyimg)

# Optimize a single PNG file
optim_png("input.png")

# Optimize with different compression levels (0-6)
optim_png("input.png", level = 6)

# Optimize all PNG files in a directory
optim_png("images/")

# Optimize with verbose output
optim_png("input.png", verbose = TRUE)
```
